text: The Websocket Server agent configuration tab is displayed when when double-clicking on the agent in the Work flow Editor. Open The Websocket Server agent configurationn dialog Setting Description Setting Description Host Enter the hostname or IP that the server should bind to. Port Enter the port to bind the server to. By default this is set to 4200. Ping Timeout (s) Timeout for the connections configured in Servers. When no data is received on the Websocket, a ping will regularly be sent to detect if a connection has been lost. Use TLS Select this check box if you want to use TLS. The fields beneath will then be activated. Require Client Authentication Select this check box if you want to make client authentication mandatory. Security Profile
